parameters.name: SideFlags
parameters.description: Array of flags indicating which side of each edge to create the ruled-surface feature

title: IRuledSurfaceFeatureData.SetEdges
description: Sets the edge to use as the base for this ruled-surface feature.
signature:
void SetEdges( 
   System.Object
Edges
,
   System.Object
SideFlags
)

parameters.name: SideFlags
parameters.description: Array of flags indicating which side of each edge to create the ruled-surface feature

remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
